original_text: The Lord will strike you on the knees and on the legs with grievous boils of which you cannot be healed, from the sole of your foot to the crown of your head.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 무릎과 다리를 쳐서 고치지 못할 심한 종기를 생기게 하여 발바닥에서부터 정수리까지 이르게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will strike you on the knees and on the legs
of which you cannot be healed
from the sole of your foot to the crown of your head
